I try to go out for a walk or do something to take my mind off things.

content.text: Nice to meet you, I'm [user 2]. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What are your hobbies?
I like to go to concerts and run. I also enjoy watching basketball games.
That's awesome! I love going to concerts too. What's your favorite genre of music?
I'm really into hip hop and rap. 2Pac is my favorite artist.
I love 2Pac too! He's one of my favorites too. I also like to listen to rock and pop music.
What's your favorite type of food?
I love seafood. I especially like eating lobster and crab.
I've never had lobster before, but I've heard it's delicious. I love crab legs!
You should try lobster! It's really good.
I will have to try it sometime.
It's a good thing you like to go for walks. Seafood is pretty expensive.
I know, right? But it's worth it!
I'm glad we agree on something.
